name: Cheese-A-Burger
description:
Oh no! You accidentally ordered a normal burger instead of your favorite cheese burger from WcPonalds! Collect the cheese chunks laid out around the picnic area by navigating through a maze of patties and avoid falling onto the grass. The 5-second rule can't save you here. . .

Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move and the Spacebar to jump. Wall jumps enabled

Rollaball but with 17 cheese, 1 burger, and a whole lot more difficultly than intended
